subject: Guest post: Copy trading on eToro — nearly 10 years of real experience
body:
Hi Blockonomi team,

I'm Tom from Social Trading Vlog. I've been copy trading on eToro since 2016 — nearly 10 years — documenting everything across 335 YouTube videos and socialtradingvlog.com.

I'd like to contribute a guest post:

"eToro Copy Trading: What Nearly 10 Years of Real Experience Actually Looks Like"

I'd cover:

- How to pick traders to copy (beyond the stats eToro shows you)
- The real fees and costs that eat into copy trading returns
- How different market conditions affect copy trading portfolios
- My honest assessment after nearly a decade on the platform

I noticed you already cover eToro on your site. My perspective as a long-term real user could complement your existing reviews well.

Happy to send an outline or full draft.

Best,
Tom
Social Trading Vlog
https://socialtradingvlog.com
